lead_paragraph: “(Dis)Honesty: The Truth About Lies” mixes accounts of people who have been caught lying or cheating with studies on how widespread the practices are.

headline.main: CNBC Looks at Costs of Liars and Cheats
headline.print_headline: The Social Costs of Liars and Cheats

snippet: “(Dis)Honesty: The Truth About Lies” mixes accounts of people who have been caught lying or cheating with studies on how widespread the practices are.
